text.section: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, except as provided in subsection (a) of this section and §§ 3A-307(a)(2), 3A-308, and 3A-309 of this subtitle, this subtitle applies to all units of the Executive Branch of State government including public institutions of higher education other than Morgan State University, the University System of Maryland, and St. Mary's College of Maryland.
